means: （容量为104盎司的）大香槟酒杯，大酒杯，大酒瓶

sentence.Network_en: At that time Abijah son of Jeroboam became ill.
sentence.Network_cn: 那时,耶罗波安的儿子亚比雅病了.

sentence.Network_en: There was continual warfare between Rehoboam and Jeroboam.
sentence.Network_cn: 30罗波安与耶罗波安时常争战.

sentence.Network_en: There was war between Rehoboam and Jeroboam continually.
sentence.Network_cn: 王上14:30罗波安与耶罗波安时常争战.

jerky 急拉的jeroboam 大香槟酒杯jerque 检查
据说是一战时候协约国兵觉得德国兵的头盔像大酒瓶(jeroboam),就开始叫他们jerry,到二战时候就流行起来回复我爱G3  回复7楼: ChiCom,某两个C某词的前三.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent.: named after Jeroboam, a king of Israel, ‘who made Israel to sin’ (1 Kings 11:28, 14:16)

means.word_mean: 1. a large wine bottle (holds 4/5 of a gallon)
